DOC.brief_summary: evaluate the safety and tolerability of ITCA 650 in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label, 4 Week Study of ITCA 650 in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes >6 months stable diet & exercise, metformin, TZD or met + TZD HbA1c >6.5% <10.0% prior treatment with exenatide history of pancreatitis history of medullary thyroid cancer or multiple endocrine neoplasia 2
